## types package

<h3>Why does this library exist?</h3>

`@issue-tracker/types` is a package containing broadly-useful shared types and type guards for our Issue Tracker app.

## Remarks

All interfaces are prefixed with `I`

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isBaseTask(arg)](./types.isbasetask.md) | <b><i>(BETA)</i></b> Check whether a given value is an [IBaseTask](./types.ibasetask.md) |
|  [isTypedArray(arr, check)](./types.istypedarray.md) | Check whether a given value is an array where each member is of a specified type |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [IBaseComment](./types.ibasecomment.md) | Comment belonging to a task |
|  [IBaseTask](./types.ibasetask.md) | A task, belonging to a list and containing comments and references to users &amp; labels<!-- -->// \* |
|  [IBaseUser](./types.ibaseuser.md) | An app user. |
